fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design

Interface IPageProcessorContext


  • public interface IPageProcessorContext
    Manages state information while processing a page requested by an authenticated user. This state information is made available to (and shared between) all page processor callback methods for the duration of one single call.

    Thread-safety: implementations of this interface are not required to be safe for concurrent access. Therefore, processing should generally not be shared between multiple threads.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies

    • Method Detail

      • getPage

        IAuthenticatedPage getPage()
        Gets the page being processed.
        Returns:
        the non-null page.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getUser

        IUser getUser()
        Gets the user for the page processing context.
        Returns:
        the non-null user, obtained from the associated ticket.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getTicket

        ITicket getTicket()
        Gets the user's authenticated ticket for the page processing context.
        Returns:
        the non-null ticket.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getUser()

      • getAuthnServices

        List<IAuthnService> getAuthnServices()
        Gets the list of authentication services registered for the duration of page processing.
        Returns:
        the list of registered authentication services. May contain zero, one, or more services; never null. The returned list is unmodifiable.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        getAuthzServices()

      • getAuthzServices

        List<IAuthzService> getAuthzServices()
        Gets the list of authorization services registered for the duration of page processing.
        Returns:
        the list of registered authorization services. May contain zero, one, or more services; never null. The returned list is unmodifiable.
        Since:
        1.0

      • get

        Object get(String key)
        Gets an object from the page processing context, using the object's identifying key.

        The routeContext key is defined by default, and cannot be overridden.

        Parameters:
        key - name identifying the object.
        Returns:
        the object if it exists, or null.
        Since:
        1.0

      • put

        void put(String key,
         Object data)
        Puts an object into the page processing context, with an identifying key.

        The routeContext key is defined by default, and cannot be overridden. Other disallowed keys are page, user, ticket, authnServices, and authzServices.

        Parameters:
        key - name identifying the object.
        data - the object, possibly null.
        Since:
        1.0

      • remove

        void remove(String key)
        Removes an object from the page processing context, using the object's identifying key.

        The routeContext key is defined by default, and cannot be removed. Other disallowed keys are page, user, ticket, authnServices, and authzServices.

        Parameters:
        key - name identifying the object.
        Since:
        1.0
